      • decimalToHexadecimal

        public static java.lang.String decimalToHexadecimal(int decimal)

        desc:

        Given an number in decimal notation. This method allows convert the decimal notation to hexadecimal notation.

        pre:

        The given number must be integer and must be located between zero and fifteen.

        Parameters:
        decimal - This param represents a number in decimal notation.
        Returns:
        This method return the characters that represent the hexadecimal notation.

      • decToHex

        pre:

        post:

        Returns:

      • hexadecimalToDecimal

        public static int hexadecimalToDecimal(java.lang.String hexadecimal)

        desc:

        Given a hexadecimal this method allows convert the hexadecimal notation to a number decimal.

        pre:

        The hexadecimal must only have letters from A to F and integers.

        Parameters:
        hexadecimal - This param represent a hexadecimal number.
        Returns:
        This method return a number in decimal notation.
